verses.text: At that \w time|strong="H6256"\w* \w Abijah|strong="H0029"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w* fell \w sick|strong="H2470"\w*.

And \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to his \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*, \w Arise|strong="H6965"\w*, I pray thee, and \w disguise|strong="H8138"\w* thyself, that thou be not \w known|strong="H3045"\w* to be the \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* of \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w*; and \w get|strong="H1980"\w* thee to \w Shiloh|strong="H7887"\w*: behold, there \add is\add* \w Ahijah|strong="H0281"\w* the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w*, which \w told|strong="H1696"\w* me that \add I should be\add* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* over this \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

And \w take|strong="H3947"\w* with \w thee|strong="H3027"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w loaves|strong="H3899"\w*, and \w cracknels|strong="H5350"\w*, and a \w cruse|strong="H1228"\w* of \w honey|strong="H1706"\w*, and \w go|strong="H0935"\w* to him: he shall \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* thee what shall become of the \w child|strong="H5288"\w*.\f + \fr 14.3 \ft with…: Heb. in thine hand\f*\f + \fr 14.3 \ft cracknels: or, cakes\f*\f + \fr 14.3 \ft cruse: or, bottle\f*

And \w Jeroboam’s|strong="H3379"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* did \w so|strong="H6213"\w*, and \w arose|strong="H6965"\w*, and \w went|strong="H3212"\w* to \w Shiloh|strong="H7887"\w*, and \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Ahijah|strong="H0281"\w*. But \w Ahijah|strong="H0281"\w* \w could|strong="H3201"\w* not \w see|strong="H7200"\w*; for his \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* were \w set|strong="H6965"\w* by reason of his \w age|strong="H7869"\w*.\f + \fr 14.4 \ft were…: Heb. stood for his hoariness\f*

¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Ahijah|strong="H0281"\w*, Behold, the \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* of \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w* \w cometh|strong="H0935"\w* to \w ask|strong="H1875"\w* a \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* of thee for her \w son|strong="H1121"\w*; for he \add is\add* \w sick|strong="H2470"\w*: \w thus|strong="H2090"\w* and thus shalt thou \w say|strong="H1696"\w* unto her: for it shall be, when she cometh \w in|strong="H0935"\w*, that she shall feign herself \add to be\add* \w another|strong="H5234"\w* \add woman\add*.

And it was \add so\add*, when \w Ahijah|strong="H0281"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* the \w sound|strong="H6963"\w* of her \w feet|strong="H7272"\w*, as she came \w in|strong="H0935"\w* at the \w door|strong="H6607"\w*, that he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Come \w in|strong="H0935"\w*, thou \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* of \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w*; why feignest thou thyself \add to be\add* \w another|strong="H5234"\w*? for I \add am\add* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* to thee \add with\add* \w heavy|strong="H7186"\w* \add tidings\add*.\f + \fr 14.6 \ft heavy: Heb. hard\f*

\w Go|strong="H3212"\w*, \w tell|strong="H0559"\w* \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w*, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, Forasmuch \w as|strong="H3282"\w* I \w exalted|strong="H7311"\w* thee from \w among|strong="H8432"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and \w made|strong="H5414"\w* thee \w prince|strong="H5057"\w* over my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*,

And \w rent|strong="H7167"\w* the \w kingdom|strong="H4467"\w* \w away|strong="H7167"\w* from the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, and \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* it thee: and \add yet\add* thou hast not been as my \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, who \w kept|strong="H8104"\w* my \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w*, and who \w followed|strong="H1980"\w* me with all his \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*, to \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \add that\add* only \add which was\add* \w right|strong="H3477"\w* in mine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*;

But hast \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w evil|strong="H7489"\w* above all that were \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee: for thou hast \w gone|strong="H3212"\w* and \w made|strong="H6213"\w* thee \w other|strong="H0312"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*, and molten \w images|strong="H4541"\w*, to provoke me to \w anger|strong="H3707"\w*, and hast \w cast|strong="H7993"\w* me \w behind|strong="H0310"\w* thy \w back|strong="H1458"\w*:

Therefore, behold, I will \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* upon the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w*, and will cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w* from \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w* him that \w pisseth|strong="H8366"\w* against the \w wall|strong="H7023"\w*, \add and\add* him that is shut \w up|strong="H6113"\w* and \w left|strong="H5800"\w* in \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and will take \w away|strong="H1197"\w* the \w remnant|strong="H0310"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w*, as a man taketh \w away|strong="H1197"\w* \w dung|strong="H1557"\w*, till it be all \w gone|strong="H8552"\w*.

Him that \w dieth|strong="H4191"\w* of \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w* in the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* shall the \w dogs|strong="H3611"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*; and him that \w dieth|strong="H4191"\w* in the \w field|strong="H7704"\w* shall the \w fowls|strong="H5775"\w* of the \w air|strong="H8064"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*: for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \add it\add*.

\w Arise|strong="H6965"\w* thou therefore, \w get|strong="H3212"\w* thee to thine own \w house|strong="H1004"\w*: \add and\add* when thy \w feet|strong="H7272"\w* \w enter|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, the \w child|strong="H3206"\w* shall \w die|strong="H4191"\w*.

And all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* shall \w mourn|strong="H5594"\w* for him, and \w bury|strong="H6912"\w* him: for he only of \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w* shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w* to the \w grave|strong="H6913"\w*, because in him there is \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \add some\add* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* toward the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w*.

Moreover the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall raise him \w up|strong="H6965"\w* a \w king|strong="H4428"\w* over \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, who shall cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w* that \w day|strong="H3117"\w*: but what? even now.

For the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* shall \w smite|strong="H5221"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, as a \w reed|strong="H7070"\w* is \w shaken|strong="H5110"\w* in the \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, and he shall root \w up|strong="H5428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* out of this \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w land|strong="H0127"\w*, which he \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* to their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, and shall \w scatter|strong="H2219"\w* them \w beyond|strong="H5676"\w* the \w river|strong="H5104"\w*, because they have \w made|strong="H6213"\w* their \w groves|strong="H0842"\w*, provoking the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* to \w anger|strong="H3707"\w*.

And he shall \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w up|strong="H5414"\w* \w because|strong="H1558"\w* of the \w sins|strong="H2403"\w* of \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w*, who did \w sin|strong="H2398"\w*, and who made \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* to \w sin|strong="H2398"\w*.

¶ And \w Jeroboam’s|strong="H3379"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* \w arose|strong="H6965"\w*, and \w departed|strong="H3212"\w*, and \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Tirzah|strong="H8656"\w*: \add and\add* when she \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to the \w threshold|strong="H5592"\w* of the \w door|strong="H1004"\w*, the \w child|strong="H5288"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w*;

And they \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* him; and all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w mourned|strong="H5594"\w* for him, according to the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, which he \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* by the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of his \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w Ahijah|strong="H0281"\w* the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w*.

And the \w rest|strong="H3499"\w* of the \w acts|strong="H1697"\w* of \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w*, how he \w warred|strong="H3898"\w*, and how he \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w*, behold, they \add are\add* \w written|strong="H3789"\w* in the \w book|strong="H5612"\w* of the \w chronicles|strong="H1697"\w* of the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

And the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* which \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* \add were\add* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* and \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*: and he \w slept|strong="H7901"\w* with his \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, and \w Nadab|strong="H5070"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* in his stead.\f + \fr 14.20 \ft slept: Heb. lay down\f*

¶ And \w Rehoboam|strong="H7346"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* in \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*. \w Rehoboam|strong="H7346"\w* \add was\add* \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* and \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* when he began to \w reign|strong="H4427"\w*, and he \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* \w seventeen|strong="H7651"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* did \w choose|strong="H0977"\w* out of all the \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, to \w put|strong="H7760"\w* his \w name|strong="H8034"\w* there. And his \w mother’s|strong="H0517"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \add was\add* \w Naamah|strong="H5279"\w* an \w Ammonitess|strong="H5985"\w*.

And \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and they provoked him to \w jealousy|strong="H7065"\w* with their \w sins|strong="H2403"\w* which they had \w committed|strong="H2398"\w*, above all that their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* had \w done|strong="H6213"\w*.

For they also \w built|strong="H1129"\w* them high \w places|strong="H1116"\w*, and \w images|strong="H4676"\w*, and \w groves|strong="H0842"\w*, on every \w high|strong="H1364"\w* \w hill|strong="H1389"\w*, and under every \w green|strong="H7488"\w* \w tree|strong="H6086"\w*.\f + \fr 14.23 \ft images: or, standing images, or, statues\f*

And there were also \w sodomites|strong="H6945"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*: \add and\add* they \w did|strong="H6213"\w* according to all the \w abominations|strong="H8441"\w* of the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* cast \w out|strong="H3423"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

¶ And it came to pass in the \w fifth|strong="H2549"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Rehoboam|strong="H7346"\w*, \add that\add* \w Shishak|strong="H7895"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* came \w up|strong="H5927"\w* against \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*:

And he took \w away|strong="H3947"\w* the \w treasures|strong="H0214"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and the \w treasures|strong="H0214"\w* of the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*; he even took \w away|strong="H3947"\w* all: and he took \w away|strong="H3947"\w* all the \w shields|strong="H4043"\w* of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* which \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* had \w made|strong="H6213"\w*.

And \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Rehoboam|strong="H7346"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* in their stead \w brasen|strong="H5178"\w* \w shields|strong="H4043"\w*, and \w committed|strong="H6485"\w* \add them\add* unto the \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w chief|strong="H8269"\w* of the \w guard|strong="H7323"\w*, which \w kept|strong="H8104"\w* the \w door|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.\f + \fr 14.27 \ft guard: Heb. runners\f*

And it was \add so\add*, \w when|strong="H1767"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w went|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, that the \w guard|strong="H7323"\w* \w bare|strong="H5375"\w* them, and brought them \w back|strong="H7725"\w* into the \w guard|strong="H7323"\w* \w chamber|strong="H8372"\w*.

¶ Now the \w rest|strong="H3499"\w* of the \w acts|strong="H1697"\w* of \w Rehoboam|strong="H7346"\w*, and all that he \w did|strong="H6213"\w*, \add are\add* they not \w written|strong="H3789"\w* in the \w book|strong="H5612"\w* of the \w chronicles|strong="H1697"\w* of the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*?
And there was \w war|strong="H4421"\w* between \w Rehoboam|strong="H7346"\w* and \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w* all \add their\add* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*.

And \w Rehoboam|strong="H7346"\w* \w slept|strong="H7901"\w* with his \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, and was \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* with his \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* in the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w*. And his \w mother’s|strong="H0517"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \add was\add* \w Naamah|strong="H5279"\w* an \w Ammonitess|strong="H5985"\w*. And \w Abijam|strong="H0038"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* in his stead.\f + \fr 14.31 \ft Abijam: also called, Abijah: Gr. Abia\f*
